problem_type: Student places tick marks to partition 1-2 section matching the spacing already shown in 0-1
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2. Section 0-1 is pre-partitioned with tick marks at 0, 1/3, 2/3, 1. Section 1-2 has only endpoints (1 and 2) marked.
prompt: The line from 0 to 1 shows thirds. Place tick marks to continue the pattern from 1 to 2.

workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2. Section 0-1 is pre-partitioned with tick marks at 0, 1/4, 2/4, 3/4, 1. Section 1-2 has only endpoints (1 and 2) marked.
prompt: Extend the fourths from 1 to 2. Use the same spacing.

prompt: Continue the partition past 1. Keep the intervals equal.

prompt: Partition 1 to 2 into eighths, matching 0 to 1.
